entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and risk of freezing rain. Clearing after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
